column1: Created By: Nicholas Njoku - PMP Certified Project Manager
Update Frequency: Weekly (with daily metric updates)
1. Update quantitative metrics weekly from project management systems
2. Conduct team surveys monthly for satisfaction and engagement data
3. Review performance trends and identify improvement opportunities
4. Use dashboard for team retrospectives and performance discussions
5. Share executive summary with stakeholders and leadership
6. Customize metrics based on project type and organizational needs
7. Archive historical data for trend analysis and benchmarking
â–¡ Data accuracy verified through multiple sources
â–¡ Trends analyzed for consistency and logic
â–¡ Dashboard effectiveness measured and improved

This comprehensive team performance dashboard provides enterprise-level analytics and insights to drive high-performing teams and successful project delivery. Regular use and updates enable data-driven decision making and continuous improvement.
